author: Staff Reporter
text:
Chief Minister Jayalalithaa on Monday filed criminal defamation charges against Desiya Murpokku Dravida Kazhagam (DMDK) leader Vijayakant for allegedly making a “defamatory” statement on the recent flood situation.

According to a complaint moved by City Public Prosecutor M.L. Jegan before the I Additional Principal Sessions Court, the DMDK leader had made the alleged defamatory statement on February 3, which was published in a Tamil daily the next day.

Stating that the allegations levelled through the statements were baseless and malicious, which were per se defamatory directly impeaching the reputation of the Chief Minister, the prosecutor sought the court to initiate criminal proceeding against Mr. Vijayakant.
title: CM files defamation suit against Vijayakant
